query.statement:
SELECT '' AS FLAG ,E.SV_STUS AS SV_STUS ,F.CTEXT2 AS STUSTEXT ,E.PSPID AS PSPID ,(SELECT M.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M WHERE M.MANDT = F.MANDT AND M.POSID = E.PSPID) POST1 ,(SELECT C.POSID_OLD FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 C WHERE C.MANDT = F.MANDT AND C.POSID = E.PSPID AND C.POSID_1 = E.HOGI) POSID_OLD ,E.HOGI AS HOGI ,E.ZZGUBUN ,E.ART AS ART ,E.ARTTEXT AS ARTTEXT ,E.SEQ AS SEQ ,E.FNAME ,'' FNAME_PATH ,E.FNAME_APP ,E.FPATH ,E.FNAME_APP AS DEL_FNAME ,E.CMNTCHK AS CMNTCHK ,E.EXEMPTION AS EXEMPTION ,E.PARQDT AS PARQDT ,E.PARQDT AS PARQDT3 ,E.PARQDT AS OLD_PARQDT ,E.PACFDT AS PACFDT ,E.PAPRDT AS PAPRDT ,E.SPEC AS SPEC ,E.LOCATION AS LOCATION ,E.PAREADY AS PAREADY ,E.MATNR AS MATNR ,E.MAKTX AS MAKTX ,E.TEMNO AS TEMNO ,E.NAMET AS TEMNONM ,E.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,E.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM ,E.PRUEFLOS AS PRUEFLOS ,E.PAPRID AS PAPRID ,E.DSKURZTEXT AS DSKURZTEXT ,E.DSKATALOGART AS DSKATALOGART ,E.DSCODEGRUPPE AS DSCODEGRUPPE ,E.DSCODE AS DSCODE ,E.VDATUM AS VDATUM ,E.WERKS AS WERKS ,'0' AS EXAMREQUEST ,E.CHECK AS CHECK ,E.REQDT ,E.REQTM ,E.REQDTM ,'' PARQDT2 ,E.PARTID ,VALUE((SELECT QM031.PARTIDNM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT031 QM031 WHERE QM031.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND QM031.PARTEM = 'E' AND QM031.PARTID = E.PARTID),'') AS PAPRIDTX ,VALUE((SELECT QM031.CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT031 QM031 WHERE QM031.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND QM031.PARTEM = 'E' AND QM031.PARTID = E.PARTID),'') AS CELLP ,'' CHG_TEAM ,E.GUIDCHK ,E.DAESU ,E.G_CHK ,E.ZZACTSS ,E.DAESU AS DAESU2 , E.DAEGI ,E.RDATE1 ,E.RDATE2 ,E.RDATE3 ,CASE WHEN E.CHK = 'X' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END CHK ,E.PAPRDT_F ,VALUE((SELECT Z.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = E.MANDT AND Z.USERNUMB = E.CPUID ), '') AS CPUID ,E.PASS ,E.S_DATE AS S_DATE ,E.F_DATE AS F_DATE ,E.DIS_YN ,E.EN_YN ,VALUE(( SELECT P.CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS P WHERE P.MANDT = E.MANDT AND P.TEMNO = E.TEMNO AND P.POSIT = 'X' AND P.RETIF = '' AND P.LIFNR = E.LIFNR FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ),'') AS CELLPT
FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, CASE WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND (PRUEFLOS ='' OR PRUEFLOS='000000000000') AND (CFREQUEST='') THEN '2' WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND (PRUEFLOS ='' OR PRUEFLOS='000000000000') AND (CFREQUEST='X') THEN '3' WHEN (VDATUM='' OR VDATUM='00000000') AND PRUEFLOS>'000000000000' THEN '4' WHEN (VDATUM <> '00000000' AND VDATUM>'') THEN '5' ELSE '1' END AS SV_STUS ,A.PSPID ,A.HOGI ,A.ART ,CASE A.ART WHEN '8950' THEN '중간' WHEN '8960' THEN '완성' END AS ARTTEXT ,A.SEQ ,A.CMNTCHK ,A.EXEMPTION ,A.PARQDT ,A.PACFDT ,A.PAPRDT ,A.SPEC ,A.LOCATION ,A.PAREADY ,A.MATNR ,A.MAKTX ,M.TEMNO2 AS TEMNO ,M.ZZGUBUN ,B.NAMET ,A.LIFNR ,C.NAME1 ,A.PRUEFLOS ,A.PAPRID ,A.DSKURZTEXT ,A.DSKATALOGART ,A.DSCODEGRUPPE ,A.DSCODE ,A.VDATUM ,A.WERKS ,CASE WHEN A.PARQDT>'' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS CHECK ,TRIM(A.REQDT) REQDT ,TRIM(A.REQTM) REQTM ,TRIM(A.REQDT)||' '||TRIM(A.REQTM) REQDTM ,A.PARTID ,VALUE(D.FNAME,'') FNAME ,VALUE(D.FNAME_APP,'') FNAME_APP ,VALUE(D.FPATH,'') FPATH ,CASE WHEN A.GUIDCHK = 'X' or A.GUIDCHK = '1' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS GUIDCHK ,A.DAESU ,A.G_CHK ,A.DAEGI ,A.ZZACTSS ,R.RDATE1 ,R.RDATE2 ,R.RDATE3 ,R.CHK ,R.PAPRDT_F ,A.CPUID , VALUE(T.CHK , '') AS PASS , VALUE(T.S_DATE , '00000000') AS S_DATE , VALUE(T.F_DATE , '00000000') AS F_DATE , DECODE(A.DIS_YN,'Y','1','0') AS DIS_YN , DECODE(A.DIS_YN,'Y','N','Y') AS EN_YN FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT019 AS A ON M.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M.POSID = A.PSPID AND M.POSID_1 = A.HOGI LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT019R AS R ON A.MANDT = R.MANDT AND A.WERKS = R.WERKS AND A.PSPID = R.PSPID AND A.ART = R.ART AND A.HOGI = R.HOGI AND A.SEQ = R.SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON M.MANDT = B.MANDT AND M.TEMNO2 = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT019T AS T ON B.MANDT = T.MANDT AND B.LIFNR = T.LIFNR AND B.NAMET = T.NAMET LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT019I AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.WERKS = D.WERKS AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.ART = D.ART AND A.HOGI = D.HOGI AND A.SEQ = D.SEQ WHERE M.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND M.POSID NOT LIKE '______Y__' AND M.POSID NOT LIKE '______T__'
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND SUBSTR(A.PSPID,1,1) = 'J'
AND A.ART = '8960'
AND A.ZZACTSS IN ('01','02','08','10','14','20','21','19')
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND A.ART = '8960'
AND A.ART IN ('8950','8960')
AND A.PARQDT BETWEEN #DATEF# AND #DATET#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M.TEMNO2 = #TEAM#
AND A.PSPID >= #FPJT#
AND A.PSPID <= #TPJT#
AND A.CMNTCHK >'X'
AND A.CMNTCHK <='X'
AND (A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '')
AND (A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')
AND (A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000'
AND (A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '' )) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '' )) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')) OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '' )) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X' )) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000'))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '')) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X' )) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000') OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000'))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')) OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST='X')) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000') OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000') OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '')) OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '')) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000'))
AND (((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND (A.PRUEFLOS ='' OR A.PRUEFLOS ='000000000000') AND (A.CFREQUEST = '')) OR ((A.VDATUM = '' OR A.VDATUM = '00000000') AND A.PRUEFLOS >'000000000000') OR ((A.VDATUM <> '00000000' AND A.VDATUM > '')))
) AS E ,SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS F WHERE F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND E.SV_STUS = F.CODE2 AND F.CODE1='QMII' AND F.LANG = #G_LANG#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
